challenge.title: pattrice jones - Intersectionality in Theory and Practice
challenge.description: pattrice jones's Intersectionality in Theory and Practice is a lecture exploring intersectionality as a feminist principle, particularly in its practice about feminism and animal rights.
challenge.instructions: Watch pattrice jones's Intersectionality in Theory and Practice on YouTube.
